question_text: A technician is replacing a laptop display panel and is concerned about built-in camera functionality. What two steps are essential to ensure the camera continues to work?
answer_options: Reattaching the antenna cables to the camera housing
Ensuring the integrated camera module is transferred or reconnected
Updating the camera’s firmware using the manufacturer’s utility
Verifying camera connector is properly seated on the system board
Resetting the camera via BIOS jumper
correct_answer: Ensuring the integrated camera module is transferred or reconnected
Verifying camera connector is properly seated on the system board
explanation: Replacing the screen assembly may involve moving or reconnecting the built-in camera module, which must be physically and electrically secured.
